references.paper_title: Phi-3 Technical Report: A Highly Capable Language Model Locally on Your Phone
references.reason: This paper introduces Phi-3, a vision-language model crucial to the visual retrievers evaluated in the benchmark.

references.paper_title: Qwen-VL: A Versatile Vision-Language Model for Understanding, Localization, Text Reading, and Beyond
references.reason: Qwen-VL is another key vision-language model utilized in the benchmark's visual retrieval experiments.

references.paper_title: PaliGemma: A versatile 3B VLM for transfer
references.reason: PaliGemma, a vision-language model, is a significant component of the ColPali visual retriever evaluated in the study.

references.paper_title: Dense Passage Retrieval for Open-Domain Question Answering
references.reason: This paper introduces DPR, a core text retrieval model and baseline for the experiments comparing text and visual retrieval approaches.

references.paper_title: ColBERT: Efficient and Effective Passage Search via Contextualized Late Interaction over BERT
references.reason: This paper introduces ColBERT, another fundamental text retrieval model used as a baseline in the comparative analysis.
